BasicDetails.Title: Lovely 1 bdr, Cambridgeport, Central air, pet friendly
BasicDetails.Description:
Lovely, luxury 1 bedroom in Cambridgeport. Central air, laundry in unit, hardwood and carpeted floors. Galley kitchen with dishwasher and disposal. Dining area. Garage parking for $250/month. There is a fitness room, community room, shared community garden and roofdeck. Cat or dog allowed for additional money. Pictures are of model unit. Full Fee Paid.
AMENITIES > Club Chroma entertainment lounge with fireplace and pool table > Fit Zone with state-of-the-art equipment > Groom Room with pet-washing station > Cycle Clinic bicycle repair station > Enclosed underground bicycle parking > Courtesy loaner bicycles available > Wi-Fi in all common areas > Manicured, landscaped courtyard > Garage parking with available electric car-charging stations > Convenient commuter location; accessible to the MBTA Red Line, Green Line and bus routes > Minutes to Whole Foods and Trader Joe's, the Charles River, Magazine Beach Park and BU Bridge

BasicDetails.Title: Historic apartment in heart of Lexington Center!
BasicDetails.Description: Unbeatable location close to all that Lexington Center has to offer! This historic, light filled, two bedroom, six room apartment has a bonus room off the Primary bedroom. With hardwood floors throughout, recessed lighting in living and dining rooms, and delightful period details, this special home must be seen. Two large bedrooms and bonus room are on second floor. Lots of dedicated storage in the basement with unit's own washer and dryer.All new double pane windows. All freshly painted. 2 car parking and shared outdoor space. Pets considered. No smokers please.

BasicDetails.Title: Sunny, Renovated 2 Bed, 1 Bath Minutes from The Pike!
BasicDetails.Description:
Commuters Dream! Sunny and spacious 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom home minutes from the Mass Pike.
This unbelievable property was recently renovated, featuring a new Chef's Kitchen with white shaker cabinets, quartz countertops, white textured backsplash, and stainless steel appliances and dishwasher. The spa-like bathroom is adorned with custom tile work and boasts a large, walk-in shower. Hardwood floors throughout, and a shared back patio space to enjoy. This rental opportunity conveniently includes in-unit washer/dryer, one off-street parking space, snow shoveling and removal services, and additional on-street parking spaces for non-winter months. This location is perfect for commuting downtown and accessing the local express bus. Moments from Stop & Shop, CVS, Trader Joe's, Oliva's Bistro, Buff's Pub, and other great restaurants in both Arsenal Yards and Newton.
No pets allowed per condo association.

2021 newly renovated two bedroom two baths features freshly polished hardwood floors throughout and large windows that let in a generous amount of light. An updated kitchen includes a new dishwasher and modern appliances for your convenience. Enjoy the shared elevated patio where you can host guests during the upcoming summer months. Minutes from public transportation, Putnam s location offers easy access to local amenities including Whole Foods and popular restaurants. This units will be available on 9/1. BasicDetails.Title: Commuter's dream!
BasicDetails.Description: Commuter's dream in desirable East Arlington! One car off street garage parking. Large private deck. Kitchen features gas range and pantry. This bright apartment has fresh paint throughout, large closets, hardwood floors and newer windows. Basement has storage area and washer/ dryer hook ups. Available now. Cat considered. Convenient to Alewife Redline Train Station, Thorndike Field, Spy Pond, Minuteman Bikeway, Library, Shops, Restaurants and etc. Tenant responsible for snow removal. 1 window air conditioner included.

Nicely updated 2 bed, 1 bath condo located on the first floor of a 2-unit building with lots of natural light and outdoor space. The unit features beautiful hardwood floors, a good size eat-in-kitchen which easily flows into the living room and two spacious bedrooms. One bedroom showcases a lovely bay window for you to enjoy. Incredible location just moments away from Assembly Row, shops, restaurants and public transportation (also less than half mile from new Green Line Extension Gilman Square T stop).

10/1/23 move date. Lovely second floor corner unit 2 bedroom 1 bathroom just between Porter Square and Union Square. The unit has hardwood floors throughout. The apartment has a spacious kitchen and bathroom. Heat and hot water included in rent! Laundry room shared in building.
Upfront cost equal to 3 months- 1st, security and brokers fee.

BasicDetails.Description:
Apartment for Rent: January 1, 2024 Address: 11 Oliver Street, Apartment 2, Somerville, MA 02145 Price: $3,000 per month, negotiable (one-year lease)
Don't miss out on this apartment! This sunny, two-bedroom apartment is available on January 1, 2024. It is on the 1st floor of a two-family home in vibrant Somerville.
You can t beat this location on a quiet street that is within close proximity to the T (Green Line, about .25 miles), Orange Line (about .5 miles), and bus lines) and great restaurants/shops at Assembly Row, Union Square, Cambridge Crossing, and Hood Park. There is a community garden, bike/walking path, and a park nearby. You will also have easy access to the highway (93).
Features include: -Large granite kitchen with stainless steel appliances (refrigerator, dishwasher, disposal, and gas stove) -Beautiful hardwood floors -Huge closets -Outdoor space with wicker patio set -Washer and dryer units in finished basement (no additional fee to use) -Plenty of on street parking available (with permit)
Please note: -No pets -No smoking -No storage -The landlord handles trash/recycling; snow removal, and maintenance.
*Square footage is an estimate from the landlord*

BasicDetails.Title: Terrific 2 bdr + study , townhouse, East Cambridge, parking included
BasicDetails.Description: Terrific 2 bedroom + study, 2 bath townhouse in East Cambridge. Open kitchen with dishwasher and microwave. Features include hardwood floors and central air. Laundry in basement. One car tandem parking space in driveway included in the rent. Roofdeck. No lead. No pets. No smoking.

RichDetails.AdditionalFeatures: Central Air,Free Laundry,Hardwood Floors,Laundry in Basement,Range

BasicDetails.Title: 3 BED/2 BATH - Multi level living! Absolute Steal- AVAIL. 10/1/23
BasicDetails.Description: 6 room - 3 bedroom/2 bath conveniently located to Central Square. Generous sized living room with an open floor plan into the eat-in kitchen. Lower level has 1 full bedroom and bath. Laundry in-unit. Second floor has 2 full-sized bedrooms, 1 full bath and room for an office. There is an attic for storage. Beautiful backyard patio for summer BBQ's! You get the single-family feel in the heart of Cambridge. Do not miss out - available for 10/1 move-in.
